name: switch-card-game
description: Multiplayer Switch card game with HTML5 client and Node.js server

scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run build:shared:prod && pnpm run build:client:prod && pnpm run build:server:prod
scripts.ci: pnpm ci:lint && pnpm ci:test && pnpm ci:build
scripts.ci:lint: pnpm --filter switch-shared lint && pnpm --filter switch-server lint && (pnpm --filter switch-client lint || echo '⚠️ Client has lint warnings - will be addressed in future PR')
scripts.ci:build: pnpm build:shared:prod && pnpm build:server:prod && pnpm build:client:prod
scripts.lint:all: pnpm --filter switch-shared lint && pnpm --filter switch-client lint && pnpm --filter switch-server lint
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm --filter switch-shared run build
